content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and ideally located. How much are you considering to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for an apartment with the lowest price possible. Therefore, I am willing to pay 400 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 400 euros is far below my expectations. I'm looking for a fair market price, which is significantly higher than what you're offering. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can increase my offer. I am willing to pay 450 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While 450 euros is more in line with what I had in mind, I still believe the location and quality of the apartment warrant a higher price. Would you be willing to go up to 500 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but as a student, I have a limited budget. Therefore, I am willing to pay 480 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 480 euros is closer to what I'm seeking, but I'm still not convinced it's the best price for this apartment. It's a great opportunity for you to live in the city center with all amenities nearby. Would you be willing to go up to 525 euros per month? This would be a fair deal for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your explanation. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 500 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 500 euros is a fair offer, considering your student status. I understand the constraints of a student budget. Let's move forward with the paperwork for a 500-euro monthly rent. I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay in the apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
